channel.title: [PI] OX Base Need a Coder a really good one
channel.description:
Hey guys right now i really need a coder to help my at my server, my server has been on for around 3 weeks and i usually have around 40 players online, and now i have 750 Votes, Now i am running out of ideas to update and i really need a good coder Please answer all of thease questions
Application: Name: Age: Experience: Msn: How long can you be active: Why should I accept you:
My server = http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=213.181.110.24

item.title: [PI] OX Base Need a Coder a really good one
item.dc:creator: @Web_developer Web developer
item.description:
@Web_developer wrote:

Application:
Name:Fabian
Age:15
Experience:2 years in JAVA
Msn:pkrune@live.com
How long can you be active:everyday
Why should I accept you:Fairly knowledgeable on JAVA, I can code anything you wish in seconds, I also have a VPS accessable please reply back thank you.

Read full topic

item.description:
@fasthop10 wrote:

Application: coder
Name: jadz
Age: 18
Experience: about 3-4 years in java all rsps
Msn:dont have, email me at txtdesiree@yahoo.com also have teamviewer
How long can you be active: after school to about 9-10 on most days weekends i have usualy all day sunday saterday and friday a few hours
Why should I accept you: ive have been working on many bug fixes and projects for pi and have gotten my self vary familiar and have been searching for a dev team for a pi server for a long time to implement my new ideas and bug fixes.
